a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball IV

p.k: The Romantic / The Uploads / The Wicked / The Traitor / The Advice / The Signal / The Girlfriend / The Parasite / The Love Gumball tries to recapture the magic with Penny by organising a big romantic gesture. / Gumball and Darwin try to tear themselves away from the internet, but end up falling down the Elmore Stream-hole. / Gumball and Darwin try to find a single nice quality about their neighbour, Mrs Robinson. / When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun, Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. / Mr Small feels that he hasn't inspired the children of Elmore Junior High, so Gumball and Darwin try to lift his spirits. / Gumball develops a strange stutter and it makes him accidentally offend Darwin. / Jamie has decided she needs a sweetheart and Darwin is the best candidate, unluckily for him. / Anais has made a new friend, but Gumball and Darwin aren't sure their relationship is equal. / Bobert finds he is infected with a virus called love.exe. He asks Gumball and Darwin to give him a definition for the word.
